hotkeyInstruct.message: Press keyboard to select a new Hotkey:

hotkeyNotice.message: Hotkey will not work when you are on system pages, eg: this option page. Please assign a hotkey that is not occupied by the operating system or Chrome itself

instruct.message: Choose how to open Tab Expose's tab selection page

shortcut.message: Hotkey (default: ctrl + shift + E - new Hotkey will work on new tabs; for already opened tabs, please refresh them for new hotkey to work)

showTab.message: Show tab count on the icon
